name: CRYSTALLEX
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the protection of private property rights in the United States and the enforcement of the arbitration award granted to Crystallex by the International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes (ICSID) in Washington D.C. on April 4, 2016.

Issues related to the protection of private property rights; Issues related to the protection of private property rights in the United States and the enforcement of the arbitration award granted to Crystallex by the International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes (ICSID) in Washington D.C. on April 4, 2016. With respect to section 14, the entities listed hold a significant debtor-in-possession loan to Crystallex.
